name: Dream Snatcher
description:
Dream Snatcher is an atmospheric platformer guiding you through your own dream but make sure to memorise the rooms before you collect the dreams as the lights go out. It's designed to be played on PC.

Music,  sound and the font is not our own.

This is made for a game jam by first year art students at Southampton Solent University.

Team:
May Knee 
Luna Hutchence
Jess Bamforth
Keira Dudley

Movement: W, A, S, D
Jump: Space
Pause: P
